name: Wes Janson, Rogue Veteran
Lore: 'Served for many years as a gunner with friend Jek Porkins in the Tierfon Yellow Aces. Expert marksmanship helped the Alliance earn some of its earliest victories.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to the power of anything he pilots. Once per turn may deploy from Reserve Deck (or deploy from hand) Disrupter Pistol for free on Wes; reshuffle. May fire Disruptor Pistol for 1 Force. Power and Forfeit +1 when with Hobbie or Wedge. If about to leave table place cards aboard Wes in owner''s Used Pile.',
